entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening then to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
